title: FOUND: T206 Vic Willis w/Polar Bear back
author: Kotton King

posts.post_title: FOUND: T206 Vic Willis w/Polar Bear back
posts.post_content:
A board member has hooked me up with a Vic Willis (throwing) with Polar Bear back in SGC 40.  


Thanks for the help.

I will also consider a lower grade example as long as there is no back damage, and the front is presentable.

Thanks again.

Hi Eric, email sent on a Willis SGC 40.
Thanks
Mike
